material.mattext:
Turn the following system into an augmented matrix.
-10a+4b=3-ca+c+b=02+b-c-a=a+4

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 1
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 2
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 3
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-array"><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

material.mattext: Remember to keep everything in the same order in each equation

If <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-pmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="bold">B</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-pmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mover accent="true"><mi>v</mi><mo stretchy="true">⟶</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mrow></math>, find <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold">B</mi><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi><mi mathvariant="bold">B</mi><mover accent="true"><mi>v</mi><mo stretchy="true">⟶</mo></mover></mrow></math>.

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 1
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 2
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

respcondition.title: Response Condition 3
respcondition.displayfeedback: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">[</mo><mtable class="m-bmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">]</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

material.mattext: Remember that order of matrix and vector multiplication really matters!

Do the columns of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mi mathvariant="bold">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo rspace="0.3em" lspace="0em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="prefix">(</mo><mtable class="m-pmatrix"><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>6</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>5</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo rspace="0em" lspace="0.3em" stretchy="true" fence="true" form="postfix">)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> form a basis for R<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><msup><mi></mi><mn>4</mn></msup></mrow></math>?
Use MATLAB to help you find the answer.
